title: Stitched with Love Collection
description: Finding the right fit in love and life is never easy. Nine young women seek the courage to embrace their true selves...and stitch together romance in this keepsake collection featuring an exclusive selection of Christian fiction authors.Tumbling Blocks by Andrea BoeshaarOld Maid’s Choice by Cathy Marie HakeJacob’s Ladder by Pamela Kaye TracyFour Hearts by Sally LaityMarry for Love by Janet SpaethBasket Stitch by Cathy Marie HakeDouble Cross by Tracey Victoria BatemanSpiderweb Rose by Vickie McDonoughThe Coat by Tracey Victoria BatemanFrom an arranged marriage gone sour to choices between family and a man, riches and romance; from a wild prairie-born lass to a World War II widow; from sewing circles to No Man's Land, can God weave romance in the lives of nine couples? Or will love unravel before their eyes?Find your favorites in this treasure of historical romance.
author: Tracey Victoria Bateman
